title: Conditional Statement Transformer
description: Interactive simulation that generates the converse, inverse, and contrapositive of geometric conditional statements and displays their truth values in a color-coded 2x2 grid layout.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Geometry
Logic
Conditional Statements
Converse
Inverse
Contrapositive
Mathematical Reasoning

pedagogical.learningObjective: Students will be able to create converse, inverse, and contrapositive statements from any given conditional statement and test their truth values.
